bug.author: asampat3090
bug.summary: Create a new filehash based CodeDriver to replace GitCodeDriver
bug.description: implement the abstract CodeDriver class using a filehash based approach refactor code to use filehash for all entities

comments.comment: Merged with PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/datmo/datmo/pull/163>#163</denchmark-link> . The new class is called FileCodeDriver and is the new default. git dependency has been removed
